title: Presenting the jury for The Economic Times Awards for Corporate Excellence
description: This article highlights key Indian business leaders. Sunil Bharti Mittal leads Bharti Enterprises. Noel Naval Tata chairs Tata Trusts. Roshni Nadar Malhotra heads HCLTech. Sajjan Jindal commands JSW Group. Priya Nair leads Hindustan Unilever. Uday Kotak is a director at Kotak Mahindra Bank. Abhishek Manu Singhvi is a senior advocate. Lalit Keshre co-founded Groww. Dr.

title: Time for India Inc to shake out of comfort zone: Uday Kotak
description: Uday Kotak, founder and director of Kotak Mahindra Bank, urged Indian businesses to break out of their comfort zone as the rupee hit a record low against the dollar. He attributed the decline to foreign institutions selling Indian equities, which have been on a buying spree. The rupee is one of Asia’s worst performers, with […] | financialexpress.com

title: Adani Enterprises tops Nifty EPS upgrade in Nov; IndiGo, Trent lead downgrades; full list
description: The stocks that saw the biggest EPS cuts included InterGlobe Aviation (11.2 per cent), Trent (7.1 per cent), Kotak Mahindra Bank (6.1 per cent), Power Grid (3.8 per cent) and Grasim (3 per cent).

title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex down 190 pts, Nifty below 26,000; auto, PSU, FMCG drag, IT gains
description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: BSE Midcap and smallcap indices are trading flat. Dr Reddy's Labs, Hindalco, Asian Paints, Axis Bank, TCS are among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers are Max Healthcare, Shriram Finance, Titan Company, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Tata Consumer. Among sectors, IT, Telecom up 1% each, while auto, Consumer Durables, FMCG down 0.5% each.

title: Sensex, Nifty Hit Fresh Lifetime Highs in Early Trade
description: From the Sensex firms, Adani Ports, Bharat Electronics, Eternal, Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles, State Bank of India and Kotak Mahindra Bank were among the biggest gainers

title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex up 280 pts, Nifty near 26,300; auto, metal, banks shine
description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Kotak Mahindra Bank, SBI, L&T, ONGC, Maruti Suzuki are among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers are Tata Consumer, Bajaj Finance, Titan Company, Asian Paints, Cipla. BSE Midcap index up 0.2%, while smallcap index up 0.4%. On the sectoral front, PSU Bank, auto, metal up 0.5-1%.

title: Will Nifty extend its rally towards 26,500-26,800 this week?
description: Analysts anticipate the Nifty's upward trend to continue this week, driven by a multi-month consolidation breakout and strong sector performance. Key support levels are expected to hold, with a buy-on-dips strategy recommended as the index targets 26,500-26,800. Several stocks, including Adani Ports and Kotak Mahindra Bank, are highlighted for potential gains.
